latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).

fields.value: Land use, livelihoods and rice variety diversity in irrigated and rainfed ecosystems in the Philippines

dsDescriptionValue.value: Conducted a nationwide survey to collect yield loss in 19 provinces across the major rice-producing provinces in the Philippines
